title: Thermos服务器奔溃
author: Sistine_Fibel
txt_content:
Thermos服务器奔溃，开好服务器几秒之后直接关闭
[23:46:39] [Server thread/INFO]: Server permissions file permissions.yml is empty, ignoring it[23:46:39] [Server thread/INFO]: Done (5.229s)! For help, type "help" or "?"

replies.author: skyliye
replies.txt_content:
目测某一个插件导致的关服，请提供完整日志
我以前遇到过authme无法加载，启动后自动关服，我给回退到旧版本了就好了

replies.author: Sistine_Fibel
replies.txt_content:
cauldron.yml 中的 affinity-locking变为True以后[00:05:10] [Server thread/INFO]: [Thermos] We're locked in! 0: Reserved for this application
